body:
Disable new varient ensurepip for AOCC compiler to prevent following error while building Python in spack environment:

IndexError: string index out of range

Python recently made ensurepip as default varient for all python versions, it was observed that AOCC-3.2.0 compiler was failing while compiling ensurepip module in Python code

Below is the associated commit which mandate ensurepip as default varient :
commit ffb3f3a20dca0317940727ee802098ccf401def3
Author: Wouter Deconinck <wdconinc@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Jan 22 21:55:56 2022 -0600

    Python: ensurepip install instead of upgrade (#28553)

Fixes #29115
title: Disable new varient ensurepip for AOCC compiler
